testcase.name: Get and Print User information from GitHub
testcase.system-out: Given initialize API environment............................................passed Given I specify the username of a GitHub User in CLI........................passed When I Send GET request to get this user information........................passed Then Above information of the user is printout..............................passed When I Send GET request to get this user Repositories.......................passed Then Above information of each repository belonging to user is printout.....passed

testcase.name: Verify stars value of a specific repository belonging to user in Task1
testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to GitHub main page........................................passed When I search for the same user and navigate to his Repositories page.......passed And I navigate to the Repository that is returned FIRST in the list in TASK 1.passed Then I verify the star count shown in webpage is equal to value returned by the API.passed
